title: On Evening Parties - short sentences highlight

content.question: The short sentences in lines 50-51 (“Now we . . . has begun”) highlight

choices.label: the move from an objective review to a subjective opinion
an important idea about appropriate party attire
a leap in time to the distant future
the transition from preparation to participation

content.answer: the transition from preparation to participation

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
